<page title>: NEC-60003437-NEC MultiSync X401S PG - 40" Class ( 40" viewable ) LED-Backlit LCD Flat Panel Display
compatible with windows 7: "Compatible with Windows 7" software and devices carry Microsoft’s assurance that these products have passed tests for compatibility and reliability with 32-bit and 64-bit Windows 7.
compliant standards: FCC Class A certified, CSA, UL, TUV GS, VCCI, C-Tick, cUL, DDC-2Bi, VESA DPMS, VESA FDMI, PSB, RoHS
connector type: 1 x DisplayPort input ( 20 pin DisplayPort ) ¦ 1 x HDMI input ( 19 pin HDMI Type A ) ¦ 1 x DVI-D input ( 24 PIN Digital DVI ) ¦ 1 x DVI-D output ( 24 PIN Digital DVI ) ¦ 1 x VGA input ( 15 PIN HD D-Sub (HD-15) ) ¦ 1 x composite video input ( BNC ) ¦ 1 x network ( RJ-45 ) ¦ 1 x serial input ( 9 PIN D-Sub ) ¦ 1 x serial output ( 9 PIN D-Sub ) ¦ 1 x audio input ( mini-phone stereo 3.5 mm ) ¦ 1 x audio output ( mini-phone stereo 3.5 mm ) ¦ 2 x speakers output ( terminal block (clamp) )
description technical detail: Ideal for a wide array of applications such as retail signage including 24/7, transport applications, conference rooms, lobby/reception installations and integration in totems and furniture, the MultiSync X401S PG offers flexible installation combined with industry leading performance.
dimensions wxdxh: 92.51 cm x 4.33 cm x 53.71 cm - without stand
features: Ambient light sensor (ALS), screen saver, Scheduler Function (with RTC), TileMatrix (10 x 10), Eco Mode, protection glass
